name: Grilled Mackerel with Chilli & Tamarind Sauce
recipeIngredient: 1 tbsp of coriander (chopped, including the root),
1 small fresh hot red chilli (deseeded and finely chopped),
recipeInstructions: 1. In a spice grinder or blender, grind the garlic, coriander, ginger and fish sauce to a paste.
2. Add the oil and blend again.
3. Rub the mixture over the fish and set aside to marinate for 20 mins.
4. In a small saucepan combine the tamarind sauce ingredients with 1/3 cup water and simmer for 3-4 minutes. Taste and adjust with extra tamarind, sugar of fish sauce. Remove from heat and set aside.
5. Grill the fish for about 3 minutes on each side basting with the sauce.
6. Serve, spooning over with the remaining sauce.
